ModMetaData.name: Tal - Vilous Wildlife
ModMetaData.description:
Vilous and all of it's wildlife belongs to mick39 Vilous and all of it's wildlife belongs to Mick Ono
This mod adds Talyxian wildlife from the Vilous universe to the rim. currently includes:
Talyxian Dogs Talyxian Goats Talyxian Stalkers
To do: add more wildlife such as Snail Cows. Give all Talyxian Animals a debuff when salt added by other mods is nearby/consumed Sprite Adjustments
i might add extra compatibility with the Sergal race mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1501315350 but it might be a better idea to make this a standalone mod with my own new sergal race
